channel.title: Soheil Beiraghi on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Soheil Beiraghi on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Karlovy Vary Award Winner ‘Bidad,’ About Rebellious Iranian Singer, Acquired by Pluto Film (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Berlin-based Pluto Film has acquired world sales rights to Iranian director Soheil Beiraghi’s “Bidad,” which won the Special Jury Prize at the Karlovy Vary Film Festival earlier this month
